title: Bronze Players
body:
Just out of curiosity. Why are Bronze players such trolls? xD I know im a bronze player too, but i try my best to help my team. So many games, I've been trying to climb of that toxic waste, but due to these trolls, feels like im never gonna leave. lol. Wish riot can help by banning these trolls, players like them tend to ruin games. 

Any thoughts?   {{champion:107}}
